abstract: Kodak’s V1253, a 12-megapixel camera, can connect to HD televisions (with an optional $100 dock) and produces video at 720p quality.
snippet: Kodak’s V1253, a 12-megapixel camera, can connect to HD televisions (with an optional $100 dock) and produces video at 720p quality.
lead_paragraph: For adherents of high-definition technology, everything must be full of crisp detail. PCs, DVRs and TVs can now reproduce images so sharp as to be unflattering. But what if you want to see the latest photos from your digital camera on your big HDTV screen?

headline.main: A Digital Still Camera Built to Accommodate the High- Definition Television Experience
headline.print_headline: A Digital Still Camera Built to Accommodate the High-Definition Television Experience
